verses.name: Ezekiel 46:14
verses.text: And thou shalt prepare a meat offering for it every morning, the sixth part of an ephah, and the third part of an hin of oil, to temper with the fine flour; a meat offering continually by a perpetual ordinance unto the Lord.

verses.name: Ezekiel 46:15
verses.text: Thus shall they prepare the lamb, and the meat offering, and the oil, every morning for a continual burnt offering.

verses.name: Ezekiel 46:16
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; If the prince give a gift unto any of his sons, the inheritance thereof shall be his sons’; it shall be their possession by inheritance.
